page.title: 08LIVING IN WARE
page.content: In Ware the shops are really interesting.Some of them used to be inns.I like looking at the shops at weekends and reading books to find out what they used to be.In the summer I like going fishing with my dad at the{ {Priory}.In the winter I see {Ware Town {Football Club.}Best of all I like { {Ware Week}.There is a fair,a fete,a fun run and you can go up {St.Mary's} bell tower. {Ware} is a very old town dating back to pre_Domesday times.Every trip into the town is a trip into the past, which makes it very pleasant.{Ware}is still a town of small shops.Many modern shops are behind old shop facades.During the last decade much has been done to preserve the old buildings and enhance its appearance. We have country fresh air and we are near to{London}.
